name: Hearts HD
description:
Hearts HD ranks one of the most welcome and favorite card games from pole to pole.

We carefully design a beautiful interface with various background images for your free choices. Additionally, this game doesn’t require complicated techniques. You will get so much fun while playing it in the company of real sound effects!

We re-design this game, according to the contacts operation of iPad / iPhone , thus making the game more user-friendly and playable.
